Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the taxable price for the sale of a motor vehicle
Summary: Relates to the taxable price for the sale of a motor vehicle; provides that rebates offered at the time of sale be excluded for purposes of calculating any local sales and compensating use tax and the state sales tax applicable to such sale.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the taxable price for the sale of a motor vehicle
